rules.description: to: doublequote on first layer and shift + doublequote -> quote on 2nd layer

manipulators.description: Toggle on/off navigation layer on home row
a -> move cursor left one word
s -> move cursor right one word
w -> Delete the word to the left of the insertion point
u -> Option–Shift–Left Arrow: Extend text selection to the beginning of the current word
i -> Shift–Command–Left Arrow: Select the text between the insertion point and the beginning of the current line
o -> Shift–Command–Right Arrow: Select the text between the insertion point and the end of the current line
p -> Option–Shift–Right Arrow: Extend text selection to the end of the current word
n -> Shift–Left Arrow: Extend text selection one character to the left
m -> Shift–Down Arrow: Extend text selection to the nearest character at the same horizontal location on the line below
, -> Shift–Up Arrow: Extend text selection to the nearest character at the same horizontal location on the line above
. -> Shift–Right Arrow: Extend text selection one character to the right
f -> Control-K: Delete the text between the insertion point and the end of the line or paragraph
